name: Ape Vs. Caveman for Raspberry Pi
name_original: Ape Vs. Caveman for Raspberry Pi
description:
Introducing... Caveman! Caveman looking for Stonehenge. Caveman like Stonehenge. But caveman no like evil monkey, sticky cactus, bad bird, pointy rhino, rolling barrels or falling rock! These things bad. Help Caveman reach Stonehenge and advance to the next level. A classic favorite, in new glorious 3D! This incredible new action-packed game has awesome music and graphics.

Features

  1. 30 amazing levels
  2. Power-ups
  3. High-score table
  4. Super addicting game-play
  5. Cool soundtrack

Raspberry Pi is a trademark of the Raspberry Pi Foundation.
